ruleBookInfo.author: text.作者@text
ruleBookInfo.name: class.name@text

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##请收藏.*https.*|.*请关闭畅读或阅读模式.*|请记住本书首发.*|[\【|「]看书.*|.*领现金红包.*|.*本章由于字数太少.*

ruleBookInfo.author: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.booktag > a.red@text
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.bookintro > img.thumbnail.pull-left.visible-xs@src
ruleBookInfo.kind: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.booktag > span.red@text
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p > a.bookchapter@text
ruleBookInfo.name: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > h1.booktitle@text
ruleBookInfo.wordCount: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.booktag > span.blue.0@text

ruleSearch.author: div.bookinfo > div.author.0@text##[作者：]*
ruleSearch.bookList: body > div.container > div.content.book > div.keywords > div.bookbox > div.p10
ruleSearch.name: class.bookname@text

bookSourceComment:
感谢 @柚屿.  提供方法
by天天的鸟蛋蛋 修改简介
提供的原方法
<js>
name = java.getString("h1@text")
author = java.getString("class.module-info-item-content.0@a@text") 
kind = java.getString("class.module-info-tag@text").replace("\/",",") 
lastchapter = java.getString("class.module-info-item-content.3@text").replace("更新至","") 
i = java.getString("class.module-info-introduction-content@text").replace("　　","　　简介：")
t = java.getStringList("#y-playList@span@text")
r = java.getStringList("#y-playList@small@text")
v = book.getVariable("custom") !="" ? book.getVariable("custom") : "0"
if(v > t.length || v < 0) { v = Math.floor(Math.random() * n.length); }
java.put("v",v)
n = "接口: "
for (o = 0; o < t.length; o++) {
  f = t[o] + "(共 " + r[o] + " 集)" + "，"
  n += f
}
intro = i + "\n" + n + "\n注:填写书籍变量，刷新详情页切换正文接口,默认接口为0，若填写数字超出接口范围，会随机调用。\n当前接口: " + t[v] + "  共 "+r[v]+" 集"
cover = java.getString("class.module-item-pic.0@img@data-original") 

url = ""

JSON.stringify({
  name: name,
  author: author,
  kind: kind,
  lastchapter: lastchapter,
  intro: intro,
  cover: cover,
  url: url
})
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
name = java.getString("h4@text")


author = java.getString("class.detail_imform_value.0@text") 


kind = java.getString("class.detail_imform_value.-1@text").replace("\/",",")


lastchapter = "" 


i = java.getString("class.detail_imform_desc_pre@html")


v = book.getVariable("custom") !="" ? book.getVariable("custom") : "0"


v = parseInt(v)


t = java.getStringList("#menu0@li@text")


Urls = java.getElements("#main0@div@ul"); 


if(v >= t.length || v < 0) { v = Math.floor(Math.random() * t.length); }


urls = Urls[v].select('li')


java.put("list", urls)


n = ""


for (o = 0; o < t.length; o++) {
  
  urls = Urls[o].select('li')

  f = "❤序号🔺" + o + "🔻【" + t[o] + "】 \n路线：" + t[o] + " \n最新章节：第" + urls.length + "集\n"
  n += f
}


usage = "\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若填写数字超出接口范围，会随机调用\n"


currentSource = "🎯当前源：序号🔺" + v + "🔻【" + t[v] + "】 (默认)\n"


intro = i + "\n" + usage + currentSource + n


cover = java.getString("class.blockcontent.0@img@src")

url = ""


JSON.stringify({
  name: name,
  author: author,
  kind: kind,
  lastchapter: lastchapter,
  intro: intro,
  cover: cover,
  url: url
})

</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

bookSourceComment:

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
while(src.match(/文章不存在/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.content:
<js>
while(src.match(/文章不存在/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result=java.getString("#htmlContent@html",src)
result
</js>##Ｘ更新最快
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##第.*章.*\s*|\s*.*如章节缺失.*\s*|你看到的.*有缺失.*或者请使用其它.*\s*|.*喜欢看.*写的.*|，最快更新最新章节！|.*完整章节\)|[\(（]本章完[\)）].*

while(src.match(/文章不存在/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result
</js>
.col-md-3 a
